title: qqwx
author: qqwx
created_time: May 14, 2022, 05:48:11 AMLast edit: May 29, 2022, 04:52:17 AM by qqwx
content: UPDATE 29 MAYBOUNTY ENDStakes will Update soon.And Distribution will be done after token sale  WEBSITE  WHITEPAPER  TWITTER  DISCORD Bounty Related All questions: HerePlease Submit your Report only end day of the week (Only Thursday/Friday Forum time); Otherwise you will get no stakes. Create a new post to submit your Report.Bounty detailsMyga Money is starting its Official Bounty Program in order to reward its supporters with MYGA tokens.20,000 tokens will be allocated to the Bounty Pool. Total USD Value $170,000 ¬†The Bounty campaign will last for 4 weekWeek 1 (14 May - 20 May) ‚úÖWeek 2 (21 May - 27 May) ‚úÖWeek 3 (28 May - 03 Jun) ‚ùåWeek 4 (04 Jun - 10 Jun) ‚ùåBounty reward will be Divided below sections, üåç Section A: Twitter campaign (40%)üåç Section B: Video Campaign (30%)üåç Section C: Article Campaign (15%)üåç Section D: Discord Campaign (15%)Mandatory Rules‚ñ†If you Submit your work report without applying, your stakes will not count;‚ñ†Must join our Discord group;‚ñ†Must join  Bounty telegram group;‚ñ†Must follow us on Twitter;‚ñ†Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;‚ñ†Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;‚ñ†Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;‚ñ†We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;‚ñ†The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,‚ñ†Each Week will end Thursday/Friday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All campaign Application Form‚ñ†Post a reply before join campaign‚ñ†Code:[b]#Proof_of_Authentication_PostBitcointalk username: Discord username: Telegram username: Which campaign you joined: BSC wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Video Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Article Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Discord Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Rules of Twitter Campaign:‚ñ†Follow our official Twitter page;‚ñ†Minimum 1000 followers need to join this campaign;‚ñ†Your profile must be public, Otherwise you will be removed;‚ñ†Must Retweet & likes 2 post every week from our official page;‚ñ†Make 2 post every week with "http://myga.money/ #MYGA #MYGAmoney #MultiYieldGeneratingAsset #BEP20 #BSC" ¬†;‚ñ†Your Twitter account must be old 3 months;‚ñ†TwitterAudit score at least 70% will be accepted.#1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;#5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;#10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Video:‚ñ†Minimum 500 Subscribers need to join our campaign‚ñ†Subscriber must be public;‚ñ†Video minimum length 2 minutes;‚ñ†You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;‚ñ†Your title must include the word MYGA MONEY. And Use hashtag #MYGA #MYGAmoney #MultiYieldGeneratingAsset #BEP20 #BSC;‚ñ†Video quality will be good;‚ñ†You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allow;‚ñ†In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, and Discord link;‚ñ†Maximum 2 videos will accept for one person;‚ñ†You will add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stakes)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Article:‚ñ†Content Must be original;‚ñ†Your blog will be Crypto related. Telegraph, Blogspot, and WordPress (free blog) will not accept;‚ñ†The article must be up to 500 words;‚ñ†We don‚Äôt allow websites with no audience or new websites; the website you choose to publish your text on must be at least 2 months old and must have user activity. ‚ñ†Content must be in English‚ñ†Maximum 2 content will accept for one person;‚ñ†Must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter, and Discord link into your content;‚ñ†Must add your Bitcointalk username and Profile link in your content;Content Rewards#Good Quality: 1 Stakes;#Better Quality: 2 Stakes;#Best Quality: 3 StakesRules of Discord Campaign:‚ñ†Must join our Discord group, If you not join our group you will get 0 stakes;‚ñ†All Participants must invite 5 of their friends to the discord group or not get eligible for reward;‚ñ†Just post Normal message (No Robotic/Automated message) and Ask simple question about MYGA money in MYGA Discord Group 5 times every week;‚ñ†Posting message with hastag not allowed;‚ñ†Do not spam into Discord group;‚ñ†Submit your work End of week (Thursday/Friday Forum time)Campaign Spreadsheet/Master Spreadsheet (Participants List)[N.B- Token distribution will be done by the team and Distribution will be done after the sale end. And Distribution will be done by vesting schedule. I am just a bounty manager, working for manage the bounty only]

comments.body: Verify your joining on DiscordUPDATE 17 MAY - Do not send robotic/automated message in Discord group. Just send Normal message and Ask question about MYGA money in MYGA Discord Group 5 times every week;These type of message not acceptable - UPDATE - MAY 29BOUNTY ENDStakes will Update soon.And Distribution will be done after token sale
